issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

Two instances under the same cluster are running with the same public IP.  This happened after the issue in EUCA-7958 was resolved by doing 1) cleanrestart of the CC and 2) rebooting of the CC machine.

*Signs*

Follow is seen in euca-describe-instances:
{code}
[bsmci@bsmci bsmci]$ euca-describe-instances | grep 2-153
INSTANCE i-6F4A4394 emi-0BFA32BE euca-192-168-2-153.eucalyptus.acme57.acmecloud.acme-net.net euca-10-17-106-59.eucalyptus.internal running acme57_key 2 c1.medium 2013-10-17T14:56:28.941Z acme57_1 eki-DDAF2EED eri-D2BD2E66 monitoring-disabled 192.168.2.153 10.17.106.59 instance-store

INSTANCE i-1EC842EF emi-E3FD36CB euca-192-168-2-153.eucalyptus.acme57.acmecloud.acme-net.net euca-10-17-106-52.eucalyptus.internal running acme57_key 17 c1.medium 2013-10-14T11:34:36.657Z acme57_1 eki-7384374A eri-925030F8 monitoring-disabled 192.168.2.153 10.17.106.52 instance-store
{code}

This is affecting all users.  Currently, its seen with 2 instances (i.e. 2 instances have the same IP as 2 other instances).  These instances are running on the same cluster.

*Actions*

* Tried to dis-associate IP from one instance and try associating a reserved IP to that instance from the command line. Though the IP got associated they were unable to access the instance after that.
* Saw the following in the CLC error log:
{code}
2013-10-18 12:25:03 ERROR | Failed to restore instance i-1CB84522 because of: Error allocating resource PrivateNetworkIndex with id 214:105 as the state is not either the precondition PENDING or the final state EXTANT
{code}
* Saw that the instance was expired on Oct. 13 in cc.log, even though its running on the NC:
{code}
2013-10-13 04:27:37 INFO | expiring resource i-1CB84522 from sensor cache, no update in 265396 seconds, timeout is 43248 seconds
{code}
* Some actions have been taken to remove zombie instances:
{code}
]# ./virsh_check_ans_az1.sh ; ./virsh_check_ans_az2.sh
Check for instance mismatch on acme57_1
diff list: < = virsh and > = eucalyptus. If > instance stopped it is ok
18d17
< i-1CB84522
138d136
< i-BCA543A5
Check for instance mismatch on acme57_2
diff list: < = virsh and > = eucalyptus. If > instance stopped it is ok
35d34
< i-3D284021
37d35
< i-3F1241BF
101d98
< i-A5CF46D8
123d119
< i-BB963DFE 
{code}

*Pertinent Data*
Interesting error seen in CLC error log:
{code}
2013-10-18 12:21:48 ERROR | Failed to restore instance i-1CB84522 because of: Error allocating resource PrivateNetworkIndex with id 214:105 as the state is not either the precond
ition PENDING or the final state EXTANT (currently EXTANT, referer VmInstance:networkConfig=VmNetworkConfig:usePrivateAddressing=false:macAddress=d0:0d:C3:C7:44:04:privateAddress
=10.17.106.105:publicAddress=192.168.2.122:privateDnsName=euca-10-17-106-105.eucalyptus.internal:publicDnsName=euca-192-168-2-122.eucalyptus.acme57.amcecloud.acme-net.net:vmId=VmI
d:reservationId=r-D4EA4377:instanceId=i-C3C74404:bootRecord=VmBootRecord:machineImage=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:730458559437:image/emi-E3FD36CB/:kernel=arn:aws:euca:eucalyptus:0000
{code}

*Workaround*

Remove zombie instances, but it hasn't kept them from seeing instances be launched with IPs already in use.
fields.summary: Instances Running With Same Public IP
fields.environment:
*non-HA*
* Managed mode
** 1 x CLC
** 1 x Walrus
** 2 x CC,SC (one CC,SC for each cluster)
